rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Part of my job lately has been posting
flyers to the notice board.

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0002
rows.name:
We're understaffed, you see. I may be
the representative of the Gulan, but
I still have to pitch in with other tasks.

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Have you been checking the
notice board flyers regularly?

rows.label: tlk41700321_04_msg0004
rows.name:
When you do, spare a thought for
the guy who has to find time in his
schedule to post 'em up there!
